subtitle: so indeed every detail of your life
isn't just a detail embedded in it is
powerful and potent spiritual energy
waiting to be released by you it's
trapped in a way in a husk in the shell
where the Mystics call a clipper just
like an orange is within it has a peel
around it and a nut is surrounded by its
harder shell all of physical reality
every aspect of it is a hard shell
concealing and covering up the divine
spiritual spark within that think of it
a spiritual opportunity so wherever you
go whatever you see whomever you meet
and the interaction you have even with a
simple Apple or as I mentioned the blade
of grass or a bird you're walking on a
street it's all brimming with pulsating
potential energy waiting for you to
release it it's a tremendous way of
looking at life life cannot be boring
when you see it that way because
everything is an opportunity you can see
a good businessperson wherever they go
whoever they meet they're always looking
how can I use this as an opportunity for
my growth for my business the same thing
here we are all should be spiritual
opportunists in a positive way how can
we see that aspect of our lives how can
we help improve it how can we use that
to help improve us and the world around
us that is the mission each of us was
sent here for and were allocated a
certain amount of certain amount of
sparks which are scattered all over our
lives
where we were born where we travel to
who our parents were
as the places we've been to the people
we know the opportunities that have come
our way the skills the natural and
acquired skills that we've developed
through our lives you name it every
aspect is part of the sparks allocated
to you and you have two choices you
either ignore it and just do whatever
you want or you look you're always
looking for that deeper opportunity
you're always looking for the deeper
lesson in everything you look at a
flower study a flower it teaches us
about the inner recesses the secrets and
think of yourself one flower is the
outer dimension and there's the layers
upon layers upon layers of the inner
workings of who we are everything in
life is a lesson to be learned
everything contains spiritual
opportunities spiritual sparks for us to
free and experience and be enriched by
